name: The Crystal Dark
description:
<><<><><><><<><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><
Backstory
<><<><><><><<><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><

While walking across the cliffs looking over the sea you slipped and hit your head.
You awoke to find that you had fallen into a dark cave. With only a torch to guide you through the cave and no batteries to keep it charged.

You are forced to explore the cave and look for a way out. During your exploration you come across a radio. While listening to the radio you realise you are not alone...

<><<><><><><<><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><
Controls
<><<><><><><<><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><

wasd keys - move around
shift key - sprint (will use up energy)
space key - jump
esc key - pause game
left click - toggle flashlight (will drain the battery when toggled on)
right click - pick up radio
mouse movement - look around
